title: ADCs are needlessly strong this patch
body: I can handle tops being strong... I can handle supports being strong... Hell, I can even handle mid laners being strong in a patch or two but one role I can not accept as being strong is an ADC. This role is the most obnoxious role to ever be strong in one patch. I do well in any other role but when it hits 20 minutes and my ADC is weaker then theirs, I might as well call it a day because teamfights will be so uneven it won't even matter how well I do in them. My ADC is fed? I can build whatever the heck I want and I get carried every teamfight because the opposing team can't do anything about it. Not to mention the ADCs that are prioritized currently are disgusting. {{champion:119}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:51}} just to name a few. The role has the strongest champions and they really need consecutive nerfs so they are not the deciding factor in a game.

So much this.  The entitlement of ADC players.  It's like they intentionally don't see how gamewarping ADCs are and have been to League of Legends.  Hell, Ashe alone fucked up champion design for 3 years and caused the mobility creep we've seen.

Can someone explain to me why I always see people who call adc players things like "whiny" or "entitled" get upvoted frequently, but when it's a different role, they get down votes to oblivion? Is the hatred of the adc role that extreme?

Yes lots of people hate the ADC role since it shapes the game in their favor.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Euwc3FXt-stop-ruining-the-game-by-favouring-adc-role

Tanks Assassins Mages are all being weakened each patch meanwhile ADC getting buffs. Not all ADC though and not everyone hates ADC role but Riot is forcing the Meta around botlane. Hatred also comes from forcing people to go botlane with auto-fill.

You know.....you're not wrong, not entriely at least.

Because Riot does always buff marksmen, or at least a few of them, any time any other class grows so strong that the marksmen are suppressed by it.


But marksmen don't have it easy either you know?  

Any half decent ADC would know that the support is the entire reason they can exist botlane, they will praise their supports like they praise the sun in dark souls.


If they don't then they really do deserve to get roasted, and i am speaking as someone with both marksmen and supports at lvl 7 x)

And while i have played with bad players on both sides i have also played with plenty of good people too, who realized the importance of their role or how much work i put in to keep them safe and steady.

And while i do understand your frustration at marksmen being enforced i do want you to consider this,  if marksmen weren't around everyone would probably be playing skirmishers like fiora, yasuo and...tryndamere? Kayle?


Because the marksmen are the strongest counters toward those who are so extremely hard to shutdown with burst.

But marksmen are also the greatest reason supports exist, without them the general healer or peel support would be less relevant and instead you´d go for duo mage botlane for CC and burst chains.

Tanks would be fairly bad too, after all their resistances would be nerfed so mages can hurt them and then they´d be pointless. Not to mention how useless they are anyway against Fiora, Darius and Trynda.


Assassins also generally profit from marksmen existing, because they and the supports are the most favored targets, mages generally have stuff like {{item:3157}}  or powerful CC or other self preservation or just massive range to keep them safe.


So the remaining ones would be skirmishers, juggernauts and mages, the others would remain to some degree but they´d be far weaker in comparison. 


But are people wrong to be frustrated? No.

Because it's often true that the botlane that wins will snowball and be able to carry games, many play that role as a duo which is far more potent than any other combo. 

And isn't it frustrating then, that two people out of 5 can keep a game going even if the others players on the same team were smashed? 

It is really, i won't argue otherwise.


But it's also unfair to make judgement and statements about marksmen based on their snowball, please do consider their base points. 

I really think it's kinda unfair that everyone keeps calling {{champion:22}} {{champion:96}} and {{champion:110}}  OP  when it's {{champion:119}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:236}}  and {{champion:51}}  that have dominated for so long.

Instead it's all thrown under the same banner and suddenly all marksmen are OP and bullshit even if their win and playrates aren't even good.

Because they are babysitted for 20 minutes, we give CS, kills, peel and protect them so they can deal damage and get fed.. just so they think they "carried" the game all by themselves and just because they have "damage dealt" bar higher than others...

Not to account for the fact that Riot keep making their life easier by buffing them while nerfing everyone else. And remember that most of the time Teamfights are lost because ADCs don't know wtf they are doing and either don't focus the right target, run away and don't deal damage while his team tank theirs, or position themselves poorly and die.. 

ADCs are like spoiled brats.. they receive everything and don't take their responsibility seriously.

But what about those who don't do that? I've played with so many humble adcs, those who realize that their supports set up those kills, the ones who know that it was there fault it was out of position. I don't think it's fair to these people to stereotype a whole role in league, even if many aren't that way.

My hero ;_;

Any half decent ADC would know that the support is the only reason they can even exist in the botlane.

All true ADC mains will be praising supports like they praise the Sun in dark souls. 

Otherwise they are naught but filthy heretics that should get roasted. 

PRAISE THE SUPPORTS!

OP is also grossly exaggerating. ADCs can easily blow up instantly if you do your job as the other 4 roles. 

you have 4 people who can fuck the adc and the 5th (your own adc) can also fuck him if the enemy adc doesnt turn on them immediately. 

adcs have always been the role that scales the hardest. 

I'd argue its less adcs being good right now and more so that tanks don't feel as tanky as they have in the past.

in the past it felt awful as an adc when up against tanks in the mid game because even with two items you can't do shit vs that much health/armor.

idk if the small changes to tank items made that big of a difference, but mid game doesn't feel nearly as bad even vs tanks. 

but yes, if the enemy adc is ahead of yours, you better prioritize that adc even more so in team fights.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/41R2EZEN-the-feel-when-an-adc-is-tankier-than-a-tank

i deleted a video of a draven with death dance, phantom dancer, and knight's vow facetanking 4 people 

he had ivern and janna shield too, redemption and locket
good fucking luck for "easily" blowing them up
Shouldn't be **the** deciding factor in a match. ADCs can be strong but when it all falls down to whichever one is doing better then maybe it's time they need nerfs.

Ziggs held highest winrate for about 2 patches or so, and consistently high for around 5 in total. 
 http://prntscr.com/fn2t52

Then why did they nerf Sunfire and Iceborn, which effects the entire class? Ironically enough, only a few picks in the ADC class are strong, but we dare call it a meta because "fuck adcs, lul".

Its a misleading statistic that you are showing, because the data is completely skewed.

Again, it was not tank meta. Having a few broken champion does not make something a META. Ekko, is not a tank at all in the first place, and his tank build when it existed was op. Also, nefing items does not show that a class is strong or not. By that logic every bad decision Riot makes is a good decision because you can apply the same logic "Oh x was just op" without looking at the real situation.

An adc should not even be CLOSE to a tank in te FIRST PLACE, and if they are they DESERVE to die for shitty positioning. How is someone like maokai reaching an adc? ow any tank is supposed to do that? Your support and allied tank will stop them! If not, they suck/ And that does no mean that tanks are broken. That means that you fucked up and thats it.

You can take mages and assasins top. Rumble, Swain, Lissandra, Cho'Gath, and many others can be played top. Assasins such as Talon and Zed can also be easily played top. Just because people dont do it does not mean they cant. Also FYI, people actually do those things, you should just pay attention.

If this game was not skewed towards adcs, such roles as melle carries, dps mages, and many others would be just as viable bot. But they are not. All of those roles you "classified" are not even classified in that way because they are flexible and can change around. ADC NEVER changes.

You asked how good Ziggs was. I provided it.

And a few broken AD carries (Caitlyn, Twitch, Draven) doesn't make a meta either, but you keep insisting based on that notion. You're not allowed to apply one thing for yourself, but not to others. That's hypocrisy.

They aren't close to a tank, they're in basic attack range and getting killed. Your memory fails you. That's why they played super long range lethality users like Varus and Jhin. They aren't killing frontline like the rest of the ADCs, and they're able to deal damage to squishies without being killed.

Rumble, Swain, and Lissandra are anti-bruisers, making them a special kind of mage who can go top, just like Teemo and Quinn. Cho'Gath is technically a tank, but really he's just a pile of shit. Talon and Zed aren't played top. **Obscure things don't get to count as fact in reality. For ever Zed top there is a Darius ADC, for every Darius top, there's a Zed mid.**

The game isn't skewed towards ADCs. Melee carries wouldn't be viable bot lane because it's impossible to build full damage as a melee carry and not get blown up in teamfights. That's why no one builds full damage Jax, why Fiora sucks at teamfighting. ADC does change. You have caster and attack based AD carries. The problem is Caster ADCs are infinitely better because they get the same items as attack based ADs AND COOLDOWN REDUCTION which lets them come online earlier and barely get outscaled. You need to be overpowered to be a good attack based ADC.

Except you proved nothing. The data you gave is misleading. Give the comparable data that compares ziggz to each adc individualy. Because there are META adc's and then there is someone like urgot (Who still gets into that average data). This skews the data completely.

A few broken carries do not make the meta, that is right. But when those broken carries are from a class that is already overtuned in the first place. That is a problem.

And im sorry, will call BULLSHIT agian. IF an adc is in basic attack range. Unless the adc is urgot, a tank is not reaching you in any way shape or form. Stopping the enemy front line is the job of YOUR frontline. If they dont then the adc is EXPECTED to die. What you basically want is for the adc to stop having any real weaknesses that they are SUPPOSED TO HAVE! And call them weak for having the weaknesses they are SUPPOSED TO HAVE!

Those "obscure things" can and ARE played in those places. Far more often than Darius adc. And the biggest issue is that even if its not meta they can still be PLAYED THERE. In the adc role the ONLY deviation in YEARS was ziggz. In YEARS.

And it would be possible that melle carries could be viable bot if ranged was not such an insane factor in the game that gives the adc's so much power. Look at DOTA 2. Thats it. Just look at DOTA 2. While the adc role exists it is NOT so rigid and stale. You can play both a melle and eranged, both a caster and an aa monster. Because both are VIABLE options. The only viable adc is option is ranged adc's, thats it. Nothing else. This shows that a role is warped, because other roles cant even THINK about going bot and succeeding.

Every position except Bot has multiple viable classes that normally fill it. 

- Support has Enchanters/Catchers, Tanks, and Mages. 

- Mid has Assassins and Mages. 

- Top has Divers, Skirmishers, Tanks, and Battle Mages. 

- Jungle has Divers, Assassins, Tanks, etc. 

- Bot has Marksmen.

Not only that, but Marksmen go to literally every other position. Why is it a problem when Ziggs Bot has under a 5% pick rate? Marksmen should not have a monopoly on the Bot position. Just because other champions can viable be played there does not mean Marksmen are weak. It means that they aren't oppressively strong.

WHO ELSE IS SUITED FOR A DPS ROLE? No one but DPS mages.

Top lane is fighting and CC, where tanks and fighters go.

Mid lane is burst, hence mages and assassins.

Support is protection, hence peeling tanks and enchanters.

Jungle is literally everything.

EDIT: Oh, people are actually stupid and downvote what they don't understand.

No, that's not how it works. Positions don't just magically have some requirement for which champions are suited for them. DPS isn't required to come from Bot. Battle Mages have DPS - Ryze, Rumble, Swain, Cass, etc - but they don't go bot lane. Skirmishers and many Divers are primarily DPS, but they don't go bot lane, either.

ADCs go bot lane, not because they're DPS, but because they are incredibly strong when allowed to farm tons of gold to purchase high-end items while protected by a dedicated support. They completely crowd out other options because of their range and being auto-attack based, giving a significant early game advantage against melee champions and most mages.

Ok then allow me to explain why you're wrong using basic logic, and I'll go case by case. Either you're stupid or just wanting me to explain, either way, you're horrifically wrong.

Ryze - Other than he sucks, he requires decent amounts of setup for damage during laning which doesn't work well in duo lanes. His ultimate is also best used in mid lane, which is why top lane Ryze died.

Rumble - He's very low ranged compared to range champions so he would suck at teamfights if he built glass cannon like the "marksmen role" does. Also his low range would lose him the lane, especially a duo lane. He's an "anti bruiser" for a reason.

Swain - All the same reasons as Rumble, except with more. ADCs, which is the entire lane, can buy Mortal Reminder. Supports can also carry ignite, unlike top laners who would be punished for not having teleport.

Cassiopeia - Her E ability makes her a high zoning against the hyper mobile assassins. Otherwise I have no clue why she hasn't been tried bot lane, except for maybe her rough powercurve.

Every single god damn fighter - Here's the one where you don't need to think hard. Why is Rageblade shit on Jax, Xin Zhao, Irelia, Aatrox, ect? Same reason Infinity Edge is. They're melee, they can't afford to build full damage unless they want to get blown up, they don't have the safety of range, and thus must build tank/bruiser items which don't scale up exponentially.

Have you ever thought that maybe it was because of their mid game and late game and nothing to do with the early game is why melee's aren't brough bot lane? Why the design of Mordekaiser "Marksmen" failed? Seriously, please just think logically, so I don't have to waste my time explaining the fundamentals of the game because someone wants to circlejerk that ADCs are broken.

You continue to troll around and completely ignore the point of this thread.

_Why does it matter if other classes are able to go bot lane?_

_Why does it matter if **1** mage was able to have a tiny, but successful, play rate in bot lane?_

_Why is it acceptable for 1 class to have a complete monopoly on an entire position?_

Everything you are stating isn't answering or even contradicting any of these questions or concerns. All you are doing is stating _why_ Marksmen are overwhelmingly strong in the bot lane and crowd out all other potential picks. 

_That isn't the point!_

We all know _why_ they have a monopoly in Bot. What we're asking is why they are _allowed_ to have a monopoly there, and why ADC mains are so obstinate that no other champion ever be allowed to set foot in the role. 

Riot doesn't like it either. They've shown through Mordekaiser's rework, the initial concept for Yasuo, designing (or embracing - Graves) Marksmen for other roles like the Jungle (so that a team doesn't hurt in some areas if they take a different class bot), and their acceptance (and explicit statements they made) of Ziggs Bot, that they want to fix this problem and give other champions a chance to be viable in bot lane.

Having a Marksmen-Only bot lane is unhealthy for the game, restricts champion diversity, and inhibits the meta from growing and developing to an extent. We aren't saying all Marksmen should be gutted and kicked out of bot lane. But having it be viable for Marksment to only have a 60 or 70% pick rate in Bot and have other champions able to succeed there and bring different strengths and attributes to their teams would be a_good thing!_

> What we're asking is why they are allowed to have a monopoly there, and why ADC mains are so obstinate that no other champion ever be allowed to set foot in the role.

No ADC main is stopping other champions from doing role. ADC is a strict role because it's required. You need DPS on your team, and AD is the only class with DPS that doesn't fall off. You need to understand that. It's not they don't want variety, it's that the variety just can't exist.

Morde's rework failed for this exact reason. He had to be grossly overpowered, or unviable because he didn't provide high DPS.

When has marksmen only bot lane been unhealthy? It never has. The meta always grows and marksmen aren't stopping it. Other champions attributes don't belong in the bot lane, they exist already in other roles. Every role but top lane and jungle have very strict requirements. Top lane is brawling tanky characters or anti bruisers; mid lane is burst; support is protection (enchance, peel, zone). You don't grasp that.

You can try it. Get 9 other people and play the game without marksmen. You'll find teamfighting very different. Play Jax vs Aatrox in the bot lane, full damage. Mid/late comes and the mage or top lane blows them up without any safety from range.
